platanus.description1: At Platanus we accelerate early-stage tech startups.
platanus.description2: We select the best founders from Latin America (acceptance rate below 1%) and provide them with investment.
platanus.description3: Then, for three months we help them grow together with mentors from tech startups like Fintual, Cornershop, Buk, and Runway.
platanus.moreInfo: More information about what we do on our website.

evento.description1: Platanus Hack brings together 120 of the best software engineers / techies in the country to build impactful solutions. From 0 to product in 36 hours.
evento.description2Part1: The event is inspired by the
evento.description2Part2: and has a unique format in LATAM: 36 hours non-stop. Hackers stay overnight for two nights at the office, and end up presenting a solution.
evento.description3: The hackers are mentored by founders from our community and finish by presenting their project to the judges and to the world, in a live stream.
evento.launchInfoPart1: On Friday, August 26th, we launched the

asistentes.description: High-potential young people between 20 and 35 years old. Software engineers, inventors, and technical founders. We seek to create a tech community and identify founders with potential who can be part of our portfolio in the future.

2024.description1Part2: was a great success. 367 hackers applied and we accepted 122, grouped into 26 teams. We received hackers from Chile ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡±, Argentina ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡·, and Singapore ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬.
2024.description2: Fintual, AWS, and Buk were the main sponsors. The event venue was Palacio Droguett and we welcomed hackers on Friday night, November 24th, finishing on Sunday at 3pm.
2024.description3: Teams chose between 4 main themes: Finance, Health, Education, and Tech. They developed throughout the weekend and finished by presenting the product they built.
2024.description4Part1: The result was 25 solutions that later had public voting
2024.description5Part1: After the event, each team shared their project on social media, where a total of
2024.photosLinkPart1: You can see the complete album

impacto.description: The event generated great impact on social media. Several hackers shared their experience in different formats.
impacto.linkedinDescription: Dozens of hackers shared their experience on LinkedIn. Here are some examples.
impacto.youtubeDescriptionPart1: You can see the complete YouTube videos
impacto.blogpostsDescriptionPart2: shared their experience on their own initiative.
impacto.diarioDescription: DF Mas covered our event with an article.
impacto.diarioLinkPart1: You can see the digital version
